mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "What Are They Dancing?", "Area Publications", "Paris Square Dance at La Reole", "Americana: Old Dan Tucker", ""Dare To Be Different"", and "Starting 'Em Young". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Homes For Square Dancing, Part VII", "Ladies on the Square: Begin with a Basic", "Caller Round Up", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Style Series: bot The Gnat Notes", "Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Beulah Samec", "Paging the Roundancers: Gaylord and Jane Matz", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
